name: Wukong
title: the Monkey King
lore: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial art known as Wuju. Armed with an enchanted staff, Wukong seeks to prevent Ionia from falling to ruin.
blurb: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial...
allytips: Decoy and Nimbus Strike work well together to quickly strike your enemy and get out before they can retaliate.
Try using Decoy near brush to make an enemy overreact to your movement.
enemytips: Wukong will often use Decoy after Nimbus Strike. Try delaying your abilities by a short amount of time to ensure that you're hitting the real Wukong.
Wukong becomes tougher to kill when surrounded by his enemies. Try to isolate him to gain an advantage.

riot_spell_q.name: Crushing Blow
riot_spell_q.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} range, deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> bonus physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Decoy
riot_spell_w.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

riot_spell_e.name: Nimbus Strike
riot_spell_e.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Cyclone
riot_spell_r.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ damagepersecondtotal }} physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ knockupduration }} second the first time they get hit.

At the start, Wukong gains {{ movespeedbonus*100 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ movespeedpersecond*100 }}% per second over the duration.

riot_spell_i.name: Stone Skin
riot_spell_i.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Stone Skin
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Wukong''' gains {{pp|3|showtype=true|4 to 8|1 to 13}} '''bonus''' {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for each {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champion}} nearby.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Crushing Blow
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong's''' next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds gains {{sti|range|125 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and reduces {{sti|armor|{{as|his target's armor}}}} for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 130}} {{as|(+ {{ap|0 to 40}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|10 to 30}}% of target's armor}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Crushing Blow'' has no cast time.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* As with most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from this ability will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* This will trigger upon structures and wards (save for the debuff).
* Both the damage and the armor reduction debuff are negated if the attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.
** If the attack {{tip|Blind|misses}} ''Crushing Blow'' will not go on cooldown, allowing the empowered attack to be re-used.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and debuff.
* Performing an action after the animation is played, but before dealing damage will start the attack timer, and you must wait before you attack again, although the buff is not lost.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Decoy
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' is {{tip|lunge|pushed}} {{tt|100|Estimated}} units away, entering {{tip|invisibility}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and leaving behind a [[Champion summoned units#decoys|decoy]] of himself.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, the decoy performs a circular attack around itself for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies before disappearing.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Decoy'' has no cast time.
* If the decoy is killed before it vanishes, it will not deal any damage.
* The ''Decoy'' cannot be targeted by allies, unless it's from an [[auto-targeted]] effect (i.e {{si|Heal}}, {{ai|Divine Judgement|Kayle}}).
* Killing it rewards {{g|25}} and {{as|{{sti|Experience|44}}}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Nimbus Strike
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' {{tip|dashes}} on a cloud to the target enemy and sends out {{tip|untargetable}} [[decoy]]s to attack up to two additional enemies near the primary target, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to each enemy struck. The ''decoys'' can block non-targeted attacks or abilities for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after hitting their targets.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Upon hitting his target, '''Wukong''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * It applies a stack of {{ri|Electrocute}} / {{ri|Phase Rush}} even if the target is untargettable.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Cyclone
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' spins his staff around for up to 4 seconds, becomes {{tip|pacify|pacified}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|8|type=time active|key=%|5 to 40|0.5 to 4|formula=5% '''bonus''' movement speed every half second. ''This is capped at 4 seconds.''}} '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}}. Reactivating ''Cyclone'' cancels it immediately.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: The spin deals {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies every second. Enemies affected by ''Cyclone'' for the first time are briefly {{tip|airborne|knocked up}}.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage Per Second|{{ap|20 to 200}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|20*4 to 200*4}} {{as|(+ 440% AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* While spinning, summoner spells and item actives can still be used, with the exception of {{nie|Crescent}}, the active portion of {{ii|Tiamat}}, {{ii|Ravenous Hydra}} and {{ii|Titanic Hydra}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block one second of damage.
